attributes.title: Life Aspects of Kailaasa
attributes.description:
5 DECEMBER 2019 - POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM TODAY’S NITHYANANDA (ENGLISH) SATSANGH. 

*MESSAGE FROM KAILAASA TODAY - IN EVERY FIELD, TRUTH OF SHUDDHADVAITA, PURE ADVAITIC PRINCIPLE MAPPED AS THE VISION FOR HUMANITY IS REVEALED AS VEDAS AND AGAMAS BY PARAMASHIVA. WHEN HE DECIDED, LET ME BECOME MANY AND CELEBRATE MY EXISTENCE, HE BECAME MANY NOT TO HURT HIMSELF OR FIGHT WITH HIMSELF, BUT TO CELEBRATE BLISSFULLY AND CO-EXIST BLISSFULLY. THAT IS THE FUNDAMENTAL TRUTH OF COEXISTENCE. 

*FIRST AMENDMENT OF THE COSMIC CONSTITUTION IS, “LET ME BECOME MANY AND CELEBRATE MY EXISTENCE BLISSFULLY THROUGH MULTIPLE WAYS.” THIS IS THE FIRST VISION THAT NEEDS TO BE APPLIED IN EVERY FIELD, STARTING WITH FOOD, MEDICINE, HEALTHCARE. 

*IN THE FOOD INDUSTRY, WHEN QUANTITY OF THE PRODUCE, PROFIT OF THE BUSINESS - ALL THAT HAS TAKEN OVER THE CONCEPT OF FOOD, WE STARTED PRODUCING “FOOD-LIKE” PRODUCTS IN MASS, NOT “THE FOOD” ANYMORE. FOOD SHOULD BE FOR HEALTH, AND ENERGETIC, FULFILLING EXPERIENCE OF ENLIGHTENMENT, NOT JUST COMMERCIAL SUCCESS. 

*WHENEVER HUMAN BEINGS GET INTO A DEMONIC MODE, GET DELUDED SO MUCH, THEY BECOME READY TO COMPROMISE ON THE FUNDAMENTAL INTEGRITY OF LIFE. THEY BRING SUCH LARGE POISON. IF THE FOOD INDUSTRY DECIDES AND ALL THE KNOWN MISTAKES ARE ELIMINATED, IN THE NEXT 5 YEARS, 90% PERCENT OF DISEASE WILL DROP AND LONGEVITY WILL COMFORTABLY EXTEND TO 25 YEARS. BUSINESS COMPONENT AND MONEY INVOLVED N THE PRODUCE CANNOT MAKE BILLIONS OF HUMAN BEINGS EAT POISON! 

*PLANET EARTH CANNOT AFFORD ANYMORE MEAT-BASED LIFESTYLE. THE AMOUNT OF LAND, GRAIN, WATER, CARBON RELEASE DUE TO MEAT-BASED LIFESTYLE FOR THIS POPULATION! WE ARE DOING SOMETHING WHICH WE CANNOT AFFORD. IT IS LIKE YOU KNOW YOU CAN ONLY AFFORD 1000$ PER MONTH, BUT YOU ARE SPENDING 25,000$ PER MONTH. THEN SIMPLY ONE DAY YOU ARE GOING TO BE RENDERED HOMELESS! 

*THE PRINCIPLES AND STRATEGIES FOR FOOD SHOULD BE FIRST CENTERED ON HEALTH. IF YOU DON’T TAKE YOUR FOOD LIKE MEDICINE, YOU HAVE TO START TAKING MEDICINE LIKE FOOD. 

*IN EVERY FIELD, PARAMASHIVA’S VISION IS SO CLEAR! HE MAKES SURE IT IS  SUSTAINABLE, NATURAL, ORGANIC, HEALTHY AND HAS THE ABILITY TO EXPAND FOR ANY NUMBER OF HUMAN BEINGS. THE BEAUTY IS THE DETAIL AND POSSIBILITY FOR EXPANSION - WHAT AN ARCHITECT OF HUMAN SOCIETY! WHEN I READ THE KAMIKA AGAMA FIRST, WHICH TEACHES US ABOUT HOW CITY AND VILLAGES SHOULD BE BUILT, I WAS JUST THINKING, “WHAT A VISIONARY IS PARAMASHIVA”! 

*THEY TRY TO ASK, “HOW DO YOU KNOW MAHABHARATA HAPPENED?” IF MAHABHARATA HAPPENED AND VYASA PENNED IT DOWN, I WILL CALL HIM INCARNATION. AND IF MAHABHARATA DIDN’T HAPPEN AND VYASA VISUALISED IT AND PENNED IT DOWN, I WILL CALL HIM “POORNAVATARA”! STILL, THAT IS THE LONGEST POEM, ALMOST 6000 YEARS UNBROKEN RECORD!

*YOU NEED TO UNDERSTAND THAT AGRICULTURE, MEDICINE IN EVERY FIELD, THE PRINCIPLE OF, “LET ME BECOME MANY AND CELEBRATE MY EXISTENCE BEAUTIFULLY” MANIFESTS. PURE ONENESS PRINCIPLE IS THE FIRST VISION AND AMENDMENT. THIS IS THE FIRST SATYA SANKALPA PARAMASHIVA MADE WHEN HE MANIFESTED THIS UNIVERSE. 

*FOOD SHOULD HAVE THESE THREE QUALITIES - BRINGING HEALTH AND ENERGY, CONSTANTLY REJUVENATING AND HEALING, KEEPING YOURSELF HEALTHY AND THIRD, RAISING YOUR WHOLE SYSTEM FOR THE NEXT LEVEL CONSCIOUS EVOLUTION. 

*AGAMAS DESCRIBE SO MUCH ABOUT AGRICULTURE AND FOOD. IT IS THE GREATEST VISION FOR THE FOOD INDUSTRY. IN KAILAASA, WE WILL MAKE ALL THIS INTO REALITY. THAT IS MY VISION FOR KAILAASA. KAILAASA IS HINDU EUTOPIA, HINDU HEAVEN WHERE WE BRING LEGITIMACY TO VEDA AGAMIC PRINCIPLES IN EVERY FIELD - FOOD, KNOWLEDGE, ECONOMY, COSMOLOGY, ADMINISTRATION. 

*CONSCIOUS EXISTENCE INFLUENCES THE REALITY! POWER MANIFESTATION, ENLIGHTENMENT SCIENCE IS NOT JUST LITTLE PEACE AND BLISS. IT GIVES YOU TREMENDOUS PEACE AND BLISS, BUT THE CONSCIOUS SCIENCE OF HINDUISM IS PLAYING WITH REALITY.
